sentences.sContent: Of the 22 officials, three were transferred to judicial departments for malfeasance, while the other 19 received administrative punishments.
sentences.sContent_eng: Of the 22 officials, three were transferred to judicial departments for malfeasance, while the other 19 received administrative punishments.
sentences.sCn: 在这22人中，有三人因渎职罪被移送司法机关处理，其他19人受到行政处分。

sentences.sContent: Objectively, the crime of dereliction of a basic form and the basic types, dereliction of duty, malfeasance of causal relationship was analyzed.
sentences.sContent_eng: Objectively, the crime of dereliction of a basic form and the basic types, dereliction of duty, malfeasance of causal relationship was analyzed.
sentences.sCn: 在客观方面，对渎职犯罪行为的基本形式和基本类型、渎职犯罪结果、渎职罪因果关系进行了分析。

synos.tran: 渎职，违法行为；不正当，坏事

remMethod.val: mal(坏的) + feas(做， 行为) + ance → 坏的行为 → 不法行为

words.tran: 有害的；犯罪的；做坏事的
不法行为的；行为不正的
